mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS "trsmrcvSeCodeNm" , a.CNTC_ID , a.PROVD_INSTT_ID , a.PROVD_SYS_ID , a.PROVD_SVC_ID , a.REQUST_INSTT_ID , a.REQUST_SYS_ID , a.REQUST_TRNSMIT_TM , a.REQUST_RECPTN_TM , a.RSPNS_TRNSMIT_TM , a.RSPNS_RECPTN_TM , a.RESULT_CODE , a.RESULT_MSSAGE , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS "rqesterNm" FROM COMTH_TRSMRCV_LOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM008') c ON a.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE a.REQUST_ID = #{requstId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTS_TRSMRCV_LOG_SUMMARY SELECT b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , b.PROVD_INSTT_ID , b.PROVD_SYS_ID , b.PROVD_SVC_ID , b.REQUST_INSTT_ID , b.REQUST_SYS_ID , COUNT(b.OCCRRNC_DE) AS RDCNT , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM COMTH_TRSMRCV_LOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM COMTS_TRSMRCV_LOG_SUMMARY c WHERE RTRIM(c.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 1), 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND RTRIM(b.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 1), 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , b.PROVD_INSTT_ID , b.PROVD_SYS_ID , b.PROVD_SVC_ID , b.REQUST_INSTT_ID , b.REQUST_SYS_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTH_TRSMRCV_LOG WHERE RTRIM(OCCRRNC_DE) < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 7), 'YYYYMMDD')
